job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Job Title: Site Reliability EngineerDuration: 4 Months contract to hireLocation: RemoteÂ Candidates who were SRE backgrounds with CI/CD focusGoing with an SLA, SLI, SLO approach where they talk about reliability1 SRE to every 2-3 areas (1 in 25-30)Skills:Windows/Linux servers--on-prem legacy hardware/infrastructure/serversCloud--preferred (Azure ideally)Network equipment (Cisco)Knowing the difference between observability and monitoringObservability: understand state of service/overall health of the systemÂ Monitoring: specific to this specific component of this serverScripting helpful, but donât need a coder--they identify areas of improvement/do scripting for integrations into Splunk, but that's handled by higher level people on team
